location1: ['Port de La MerDubai, Jumeirah, La Mer']
descriptions:
["DescriptionGulf Sotheby's International Realty is pleased to offer you this beautiful project in La Mer, Sur La Mer.
Sur La Mer is located adjacent to Port De La Mer, a ground-breaking master community located at the tip of the peninsula.
Residents have access to unparalleled shopping, dining and hospitality experiences, along with leisure, entertainment and convenience options.
Sur La Mer Townhouses by Meraas situated within the Port De La Mer in the heart of Jumeirah 1. First Freehold waterfront community in Jumeirah. The most accentuating feature of a good location is the connectivity it offers. Port De La Mer can be reached by both roadway and waterway. Dwellers can commute from malls to amusement parks to airports in a flash. Sur la Mer Townhouses at Port De La Mer are within 10-15 minutes radius of most popular properties in the city, out of which a few of them are by Meraas.
-190+ Berth Marina
-Landscaped Terraces
-World Class Yacht Club
-Private Beach Access
-Outdoor park with kids play areas and private landscaped terraces
-The First Freehold Master Community in Jumeirah
-5 minutes to La Mer
-10 minutes to City Walk
-15 minutes to Dubai Intl. Airport
-45 minutes to Al Maktoum Airport
Port De La Mer can be reached by road and sea, meaning residents can take in the spectacular coastline at their leisure, be at one of the city’s famous shopping malls in minutes or be boarding a flight to more than 240 destinations in next to no time.
Contact Gulf Sotheby's International Realty for a complete project overview of this extraordinary property."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionFully upgraded and renovated palatial Mediterranean Atrium Entry Villa. It is located on a popular high Frond within walking distance to the new Nakheel Mall &The Pointe.  This Palm Jumeirah property sits on an extended plot of 7,797 sqft and enjoys sweeping views of the sea looking eastwards up between the fronds.The gardens were landscaped by Terra Verde in a restful Thai theme with corresponding clever subtle garden lighting.
The current owner bought extra land from the master developer extending the plot by over 1,000 sqft, which noticeably makes the garden bigger compared to most other garden home villa
Internally, the principal dividing wall has been repositioned in the ground floor changing almost all of the Nakheel fittings and fixtures.  This created a fully open plan lounge, dining room, study with built in hardwood library and large TV incorporating a home theatre speaker system and bright kitchen. . The kitchen has been redesigned with bespoke Miele units incorporating Miele automatic closure kitchen cabinets and appliances include built in expresso coffee machine. All the sanitary units in the house are from Bagno.  
On the first floor, the two original sea facing bedrooms have been opened into one huge private master suite with large balcony creating a beautiful effect featuring sumptuous Brazilian hardwood flooring and Italian lighting with electrically operated blinds. The master en-suite leading from the dressing area has been completely knocked down and redesigned to create a spa themed tranquil bathroom.
FEATURES:
- 5,100 Sqft Built Up Area
- Fully Upgraded
- Fully Landscaped
- Sea View
- Extended plot
- Open Plan
Visually, this is an outstanding Villa and an absolute “must see” for discerning buyers
Exclusive to Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Gulf Properties.']
